Name: Kigali
Description: Kigali is the capital and largest city of Rwanda. It is known for its cleanliness, rapid development, and being the political and economic center of the country.

Name: Eastern Province
Description: The Eastern Province of Rwanda is known for its agricultural activities, especially in rice farming, and is one of the most densely populated regions.

Name: Western Province
Description: Western Province is known for its beautiful landscapes, including mountains and lakes, such as Lake Kivu. It is also an agricultural hub for the country.

Name: Northern Province
Description: The Northern Province is known for its mountainous terrain and vibrant agriculture, including tea and coffee farming.

Name: Southern Province
Description: Southern Province is famous for its cultural heritage, including historical sites, and its agricultural activity, particularly in the production of crops like maize and beans.
